participant_1.background:
When i have nothing else to do , i read books.
I am a vegetarian.
I work as a bartender.
I like to write poetry.

participant_2.background:
I like taking pictures.
I want to put my photos to a music video staring adam levin.
I want to travel the world taking photographs of my travels.
I am a widow.

content.text: I like to read books when I have nothing else to do. What do you like to do when you have free time?
I like to take pictures. I'm thinking of putting them to a music video starring Adam Levine.
That sounds cool! I love Adam Levine. I'm also a big fan of his band, Maroon 5.
Me too! I've seen them in concert a few times. They're amazing live.
I've never seen them live, but I've heard they're great.
They are. You should definitely see them if you get the chance.
I will if I can. So, what kind of pictures do you like to take?
I like to take pictures of nature and people. I also like to take pictures of my travels.
I love taking pictures of nature too. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
Me too. It's a great way to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life.
So, where have you traveled to?
I've been to a lot of places, but my favorite place was New Zealand.
New Zealand is beautiful! I've always wanted to go there.
You should definitely go. It's an amazing place.
I will if I can. So, what are some of your favorite pictures you've taken?
I have a lot of favorite pictures, but one of my favorites is a picture I took of a waterfall in New Zealand. It was just so beautiful.
That sounds amazing! I'd love to see it.
Sure, I'll send it to you
